fields.name: Branch
fields.description: The branch which will trigger the auto deployment

fields.name: GitHubActionConfiguration
fields.description:
Container App Revision Template with all possible settings and the
defaults if user did not provide them. The defaults are populated
as they were at the creation time

fields.name: OperationState
fields.description: Current provisioning State of the operation

fields.name: RepoUrl
fields.description: The repo url which will be integrated to ContainerApp.
